review.room_type: Suite Junior NhÃ¬n Ra Cáº£nh NÃºi Non
review.comment_positive: After staying in the city, we were so relieved to find this peaceful place in the country. We stayed in the private room, and it was gorgeous! review.room_type: Suite Junior NhÃ¬n Ra Cáº£nh NÃºi Non
review.comment_positive: After staying in the city, we were so relieved to find this peaceful place in the country. We stayed in the private room, and it was gorgeous!
